views.Scarborough Subway: Build the council-approved and fully funded three-stop subway extension to the Scarborough Subway RT
views.Transit Expansion: Build a downtown relief line subway. (Says part of the line can be funded through sale of Toronto Hydro; claims the line can be built without a tax increase.)
views.Land Transfer Tax: Reduce the burden of the land transfer tax by raising the threshold levels at which the escalating rates apply
views.Property Taxes: Keep property tax increases 'within' the rate of inflation
views.Gardiner Expressway: Pursue 'hybrid' proposal to reconfigure the eastern Gardiner Expressway Expressway rather than tear it down or preserve the existing expressway
views.Island Airport Jets: Support the island airport Transit Expansion if certain conditions are met, wonâ€™t comment on Island Airport Jets. (Previously rejected the proposals for Island Airport Jets and runway Transit Expansion.)
views.Privatization: Sell a majority stake in Toronto Hydro
views.City Officials: Appoint a single 'czar' to oversee transportation issues
views.Events: Pursue bid for 2026 World Cup along with cities in the northern U.S. such as Detroit and Chicago
views.Red Tape: Outsource sports-field-permit process, which she says will make it easier to obtain permits; merge transportation-related departments into one new agency
views.Ranked Ballots: Support the use of ranked ballots in municipal elections
